name: Game 1: Terrain
description:
• Although the lava is in the map, I have not implement my scripting in yet, so it does no damage for now. 
  • I will be adding in scripting that will make sure you will not be able to walk on the lava. 
  • In addition, the blue sphere, red cube, and axe are all collectibles that I will later script in as well. For now they are there temporarily so I remember where I put them. 
  • The pink platforms are also in the game to remind me where I will be placing the moving platforms(their size and color will change from the current look). 
  • The weird log/trees on certain building will later be switched over to debris that the player must have the axe to get past. 
  • The helicopter at the end of the map is where the player must reach to beat the game, but it has not yet been scripted to give an win scene.
